bibl.title: Leaves from a Manichaean Codex.
bibl.note: Part of the codex has been published by: R.G. JENKINS, Papyrus 1 from Kellis. A Greek Text with Affinities to the Acts of John, The Apocryphal Acts of John (Kampen, 1995) pp. 197-216. The overall purpose of the codex, with its 'mix' of texts, can not be provided with a clear context. The contents suggest some liturgical utility. Early fourth century C.E. - See: Colin A. HOPE, The Archaeological Context of the Discovery of Leaves from a Manichaean Codex, ibidem 117 (1997) pp. 156-161, 2 fig. et pll. XI-XII, 2.
GARDNER I. and Klaas A. WORP, Leaves from a Manichaean Codex.
141.4 P. Kellis Gr. sans No. d'Inv.
